Text: RE Revisions to NDA Cc Leslie The changes are fine by me In fact I like them so much Ill now use this as our standard NDA Do I owe you legal fees Pls send me a fax number and address so I can fwd signed fax copy and then two fair copies via post g Original Message From Leslie Hansen mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To Cc Dave Samuels Tana Jones Subject Revisions to NDA Dave Samuels asked that I review the Nondisclosure Agreement that you forwarded to him yesterday I have reviewed the NDA and prepared a number of revisions to the Agreement Please give me a call to discuss my revisions after you have had an opportunity it review Regards Leslie Hansen See attached file ISPNI NDAdoc
